pr_title: Remove a class name of cglib from `serviceName`

timeline.message:
Remove a class name of cglib from `serviceName`

Motivation:

Spring proxies a bean using [cglib](https://www.baeldung.com/cglib) to intecept a method.
This makes serviceName of `RequestLog` dirty and decrease readability in access logs or metrics.

Modifications:

- Remove cglib class name from `serviceName` of annotated services.
- Add proper default name instead of lambda class name produced by JDK.

Result:

- You no longer see a cglib class name from `serviceName`.
- Fixes #3103
